ambrosia.context package¶

Module contents¶

class ambrosia.context.AmbrosiaContext(configfile)[source]¶

Bases: object

Objects of this class hold all relevant information for one run of Ambrosia:

  • config (ambrosia.config.Config): the configuration
  • db (ambrosia.db.AmbrosiaDb): the database (currently not used)
  • analysis (ambrosia.model.Analysis): the object containing the Analysis results.
  • clock_syncer (ambrosia.clocks.ClockSyncer): used to syncronize clocks (emulator <-> host)
  • plugin_manager (ambrosia.plugins.PluginManager): the object holding information about the Ambrosia plugins
Parameters:configfile (str) – path to configuration file
